analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#241-249):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#245)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#246-247)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#256-270):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#266)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#266-267)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#269)

InitialTokenDistribution.initialTransfer (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#337-343) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,to,amount) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#341-343)

InitialTokenDistribution.lock (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#343-357) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(timelocked[to]),amount) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#351-356)

AbacasTokenFactory.create (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol#683-693) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.approve(initialDistribution,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/44/0x79ca3902e498f01b825f8e2dd8fb51d35089fe39.sol)
